about_the_game:
Enemy ships are attacking the entire galaxy!
The Solar System is in danger!
You have no choice but to grab your spaceship and save your planet!
As a cosmic warrior with unlimited potential, you will need to arm yourself with extraordinary weapons and fight against dangerous enemy ships!
The horde has numerical superiority - every mistake and you will be annihilated!

FEATURES
- 8 destructive weapons
- 6 passive skills
- tech tree for upgrading skills
- 50 levels with scalable enemy difficulty
- system of bonuses
- three different enemy types and a boss

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: 2+ GHZ Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: 4 Core or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
